<title level="1" right="Trait">[Hefty](/Traits.aspx?ID=478)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 219 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

A hefty shield is so heavy that raising it takes more effort. [Raising a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) with the hefty trait is a two-action activity unless your Strength score equals or exceeds the number with the trait.
name: Hefty
